p: Between January 22 and March 31, 2020, 12,734 patients were admitted to the ED. By contrast, 24,187 patients were admitted during the same period in 2019. The number of emergency patients admitted to the ED in 2020 decreased by 47.4%, compared to the number in 2019. However, the number of patients with Grade 1 increased by 66.7% year on year. Significant differences were observed in the composition of the grades of patients admitted to the ED between the two time periods. The summative percentage of Grade 1â€“3 patients out of the total patients admitted in 2020 was 19.9%, significantly higher than 14.9% in 2019. Moreover, the percentage of Grade 1 out of the total patients in 2020 was threefold higher than that of 2019.
